```{r}
install.packages('cowplot')
```

```{r}
ggdraw() + 
  draw_image("assets/model_org_intro/model_organism_collage.jpeg", width = 0.5) + 
  draw_image("assets/database_intro/database_logos.png", width = 0.5, x = 0.5)
```

